info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:32AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Transylvania, northwestern Henderson, eastern Haywood and southwestern Buncombe Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 132 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Waynesville, or 5 miles north of Lake Junaluska, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Downtown Asheville, Waynesville, West Asheville, North Asheville, Woodfin, Canton, Lake Junaluska, Clyde, B.R. Parkway-Mount Pisgah To The Nc Arboretum and Leicester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
